gred.nucleus.core

Class NucleusSegmentation

  • java.lang.Object
    • gred.nucleus.core.NucleusSegmentation

  • public class NucleusSegmentation
extends java.lang.Object
    this class allows the realization of segmention method in the image in input. This segmentation is based on the method of Otsu, and we add the maximization of the sphericity (shape parameter) of detected object .
    Author:
    Poulet Axel

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • applySegmentation

        public ij.ImagePlus applySegmentation(ij.ImagePlus imagePlusInput)
        Compute of the first threshold of input image with the method of Otsu From this initial value we will seek the better segmentaion possible: for this we will take the voxels value superior at the threshold value of method of Otsu : Then we compute the standard deviation of this values voxel > threshold value determines which allows range of value we will search the better threshodl value : thresholdOtsu-ecartType et thresholdOtsu+ecartType. For each threshold test; we realize a opening and a closing, then we use the holesFilling. To finish we compute the sphericity. The aim of this method is to maximize the sphericity to obtain the segmented object nearest of the biological object.
        Parameters:
        imagePlusInput -
        Returns:
